content: Macos-related PRs had some trouble finding reviewers (or generally developers familiar with Macos who could weigh in) recently - see e.g. #88137, #90499. Maybe we could have a macos ping group (like we do for windows)?
That seems reasonable to me. I think you'd need to add a macos team to rust-lang/team, and then add a [ping.macos] section to triagebot.toml in rust-lang/rust.
I'd like to have that as well.
OK, great. I guess the process to follow is outlined here: https://forge.rust-lang.org/compiler/notification-groups.html#creating-a-notification-group. I will start the MCP next week.
